Andou then reminds her that Celepara Opera Company are having their debut concert for the Winter Dream Parade Coord, but that Mikan seems to have disappeared. Mikan has been having doubts about the events proceeding the Winter Grand Prix, after failing to talk to Aroma about it she becomes depressed and watches pigeons eating bread in Pripara. Hibiki arrives and tries to get her to come to the debut concert, struggling at first before consulting the guide book Aroma gave her for how to deal with Mikan. Celepara Opera Company perform the concert but afterwards Mikan goes to find Aroma, deciding she doesn't want to be part of Hibiki's Dream Team anymore. Mikan gives Hibiki her Priticket containing her copy of the Autumn coord before leaving with Aroma. As Laala watches Hibiki leave, she notices an idol refusing to trade Pritickets with another idol. When questioned, the girl said its against the rules to trade with an idol of a lower rank than yourself. Shocked Laala, Dorothy, Reona and Mirei attempt to register for a live, realising their managers are missing. Both Kuma and Usagi turn up pushing a box on a trolley, while wearing manual labour clothes, and tell the idols that all mascots have been made re

41.SummaryEnglish: Following the events of the previous episode, Laala and Mirei's entry failed. Together with Dorothy and Reona, they were surprised and questioned Meganee, but before she answered, it was announced that Sophie would perform. Laala, Dorothy, Leona, especially Mirei, were surprised that her entry was accepted. During Sophie's performance, everyone was amazed and some are surprised when she performed Cyalume Fairy out of the Dream Theater. After the performance, Hibiki announced that only her teammates in CelePara Opera Company and Top Class idols can perform and participate in the Spring Grand Prix. However, since there are not enough idols to compete with CelePara Opera Company, she announced that the said unit automatically won and will participate in the Dream Parade. She also announced that Mikan left the group and will be replaced by Peyonce. Both Sophie and Shion are surprised by both news. Laala and Mirei, at once, approached Hibiki to explain the case with her and also tried to convince her to change the system again, but refuses. She also told Mirei that her determination wont grant her victory, making her a little upset. Andou pushes away the two girls ending the conversation. Meanwhile, Meganee received a call from Peyonce that she wont be able to make it because of a sand storm. Ajimi notices her and the fact she is lost. Since Peyonce can't make it, she decides to perform instead. After the performance, Meganee showed the Spring Dream Parade Coord with the audience complimenting it as pretty but they then realized that they can't win it. They all left the performance hall and optimstically handled the situation but are actually sad. Meanwhile, Sion and Sophy are looking for Mirei. Outside the CelePara Castle, the supporting cast, Aromageddon, and the West Twins gathered together and shout out that they dislike the new CelePara system. They're also worried about Mirei, who soon, along with Laala, joins the group, with a depressed expression. Sion and Sophy

42.SummaryEnglish: Laala tries to convince Mirei to return to being an idol, but Mirei refuses. However in Pripara a mysterious new idol appears, and Laala and the others get a shock when they find out it is non other than Gaaruru, Falulu's sister, but she is no longer a mini Falulu and has grown up. Gaaruru tells the others that she has been working hard to become and idol, and came back to Pripara to make her debut so that her big sister and her friends could watch. But she is frustrated that she is not allowed to perform because of the new rules in Pripara. Everyone heads out towards Neko's bar, where Meganii and the mascots have been spending alot of time since Hibiki's take over. Meganii leaves to put some of his things in the trash when he sees Laala and the others coming. He hides behind the trash cans and watches as Gaaruru sings and dances to the other who all applaud her. Neko and the mascots also appear after hearing Gaaruru sing. When Laala tells Kuma that Gaaruru wants to debut, Neko points out Meganii and says he maybe able to help. After some convincing Meganii gets over his depression and shows the group a hidden stage under an abandoned building. He agrees that the idols can use it if they help to fix things up. Everyone gets to work and the stage is up and running in no time. As Gaaruru gets ready for her debut, Laala and Kuma come up with a plan to lure Mirei into Pripara under the pretext of returning her Pripass, Cyalume charm and ticket bag. Once in the park, Laala and the others force her into the underground stage to watch Gaaruru perform. Falulu, Sophy and Sion also come to watch along with all the idols that are friends with Laala and the others. As Gaaruru performs she falls over a number of times but gets back up and continues, something Mirei takes note of. At the end of her performance, Gaaruru gains the pink lovely cyalume charm with golden wings like the ones Falulu received before trading them with Laala. Mirei also comes to realise the importance of n

43.SummaryEnglish: Laala and the others start handing out leaflets to try and promote the new found underground stage where all idols are allowed to perform. Although they mostly get ignored, an old friend of Laala's, Hanana appears and takes a leaflet before being dragged off to a Celepara performance by some friends. Hanana doesn't enjoy the show and sneaks out part way through. Meanwhile Gaaruru who is also handing out leaflets, bumps into Aroma and Mikan who offer to give her a hand. Hanana appears and asks Mikan where the underground stage is. The girls take Hanana to the stage where she is able to watch all her friends perform. Laala then suggests Hanana perform. Alhough reluctant at first, Hanana gains confidence from the support of the others and makes her debut. Falulu also sneaks off from Hibiki to watch Gaaruru perform, taking pride in her sister's ability. Other idols begin to express their displeasure that they cannot perform in Celepara because they are not top idols and begin attending the underground stage. As its popularity increases, Laala sends one of her regular updates to Fuwari. Fuwari is back in the Palps living happily with her goats, but her father thinks that she misses being an idol. He confronts her and asks her to think about how much she has changed after attending Pripara. Fuwari then realizes she misses her friends, especially Toriko and decides to return to Parajuku. Meanwhile Ajimi is abroad looking for a childhood friend. She finds the house her friend lived in and sneaks through a secret hole in the hedge and into the back garden. After bumping into the old gardener and explaining who she is, she asks if her friend still lives there. The gardener reveals that Ajimi's friend is in Japan, and is non other than Hibiki.

7.TitleEnglish: I've Had Enough of Aromat Cards!

9.TitleEnglish: Playing Three Roles Alone Is Hard!

12.TitleEnglish: It has come! The Divine Idol Grand Prix!

15.TitleEnglish: LOVE! Devil Color! With Magic, the Devil can do anything!

17.TitleEnglish: The Divine Idol Grand Prix is Over

18.TitleEnglish: Emergency meeting! It's a talented manager ~kuma!

25.TitleEnglish: Hurry up! Divine Idol Grand Prix!

27.TitleEnglish: The Missing Managers! The Mysterious Girl from Sapanna

29.TitleEnglish: The Big Sister, the Little Sister, the Princess and the Beast

36.TitleEnglish: Let's Live! The Main Character is You

38.TitleEnglish: The Grand Prix is Not So Sweet ~ucha

42.TitleEnglish: Heaven and Hell? The Eve of the Battle!

45.TitleEnglish: Valentine's Day is Not So Sweet

1.SummaryEnglish: Yui Yumekawa is a sixth grade boarding student at Avocado Private Academy where BoyPara, boys who are idols, is very popular. She loves to daydream about becoming an PriPara idol also called Delusion Time which causes her to be late occasionally. When she is running late to class, she sees a Prism Stone shop opening up. When she is looking at the Prism Stone store, Laala Manaka, who is a Divine Idol in season 3 of PriPara, collides into Yui. The Principal Babaria introduces Laala as the new transfer student. Yui thinks Laala is joking that she is a Divine Idol from SoLaMi SMILE. After class, she goes to the new store, where she meets Laala. They both enter the gate, unfortunately Laala can't PriPara Change, looking the same age in her new school, due to running into Yui and bending her PriTicket. When they enter into Paparajuku PriPara, they get Idol Watches which they have to max up all way to get a performance. Then Yui meets the mascot Punicorn which becomes her manager and max out her Idol Watch. Then she performs a three-minute performance on stage, using a pre-made making drama which Mirei and Laala did in season 1, the very first performance in Paparajuku. After the performance, Laala and Yui become roommates after running into the dorm before 5:00 due to Principal Babaria strict dorm rule where they trade Friend Tickets.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yui asks why Laala is here in Parajuku, Yui believes that Laala got stranded after a boat crash and her stepmother casted her out. While Laala explains that the other two Divine Idols, Sophy and Mirei went to different cities to hype PriPara in the respected cities. When Laala and Yui are on lunch break, Laala never knew there was a Boy PriPara, BoyPara, in Paparajuku. During lunch break, Principle Babaria tells all the student that PriPara is for only boys and the female idol is the epitome of unseemliness, banning all the girls to go to Girls' PriPara. The Principle Babaria calls Yui into her office to have her weed out the school's entire rear-grounds without getting any help due to performing in PriPara. When Yui begins her weeding, Laala tries to get the cheerleaders to come to PriPara. The cheerleaders says they are going to watch the BoyPara and they transform in sheep uniforms and goes into a tunnel with Yui and Laala staying outside. Yui goes back to weeding while Lala enters the tunnel and tries to find a way to get to the girl PriPara. Minami Mirei calls Laala and ask her how she is doing in Parajuku which Laala lies that she is bringing a lot of idols to PriPara. After the phone call, Laala begins to dig a tunnel with a spoon first, then a pickaxe while Yui still weeding the next day. The next day, Yui and her two friends, Hana and Suzu, help Laala to finally dig a tunnel to PriPara. The four girls enter PriPara and Laala's Idol Watch maxes out due to digging the most where she transforms into the grownup Laala in SoLaMi SMILE which surprises Suzu, Hana and Yui, who finally believes she is a Divine Idol. She does a three-minute performance and does a speech after her performance saying PriPara is place that all girls' dreams can be granted while Suzu and Hana realize that girl idols are fun too and want to go back to PriPara. After the speech, Meganee announces they are going to have a competition in June.

3.SummaryEnglish: Laala and Yui make the tunnel safer to travel to Girls' PriPara. When they are discussing about making drama, Suzu and Hana tell them not to discuss it at the table because of the head disciplinarian Mimiko who can hear anything a kilometer away. They ask schoolmates for ideas for the making drama. They are then confronted by the Principal saying if they get into Girls' PriPara, they will have to weed out the grounds. They go back to dorm to eat while Laala notices a book she saw before where Yui says it is her dreamy-cute design book. Yui tells her she has more and opens up the closet and all the books collapse on Laala which Yui says she has been designing them when she was three years old. Mimiko does an inspection in the dorm at 9:00 saying they cannot eat after 8:00 and has strict rules in the dorms. Suzu and Hana say that dreams and freedom are both denied here. Laala and Yui go outside sneakily to cook a midnight snack where they find the Principal watching the BoyPara where Yui cooking machine, Cooky, said something aloud. The Principal puts on the siren and headlight from the tower of school while Nino is doing her late night run, she collides into Laala and Yui. She helps them get away from the headlights and they both get into the tunnel to cook ramen with Cooky with sheep costumes then bird costumes and this helps Yui to make her making drama. Her Idol Watch maxes out and Laala brings some more people where Yui finally does her making drama in her performance. After the performance, a PriPara Cafe building comes out of nowhere and Meganee announces the name for the competition, Idol Time Grand Prix, where she tells the girls if they don't get any participants the Paparajuku PriPara will be closed and Laala will be fired as a Divine Idol.

4.TitleEnglish: Nice to see you! It's Mirei!
4.SummaryEnglish: Laala and Yui hears that Mirei is coming to Parajuku. Laala and Yui panics because Laala told Mirei that she is bringing a lot of idols to Paparajuku PriPara. Laala decides to use the hologram trick that her sister used to create buildings and people in PriPara from Cooky. Laala tells Yui to wait for Mirei to come to Paparajuku PriPara at the entrance. Yui meets Mirei and thinks she is a new idol. They both go in and Yui is surprised that Mirei is another Divine Idol. Mirei is also surprised that Laala is short and Laala explains what happened to her. Mirei goes around PriPara and finds out that Yui and Laala are using holograms and mannequins. She hears from Laala that Paparajuku PriPara will be closed and Laala will be fired as a Divine Idol so she decides to help them get more girls into PriPara. Mirei brings a whiteboard and tells all the girls in Avocado Private Academy to come to PriPara. The Head Disciplinarian Mimiko gives 2 tickets to Mirei and Mirei tells Mimiko she is breaking one school regulations. She then tells Mimiko that she is the Exemplary Head Disciplinarian Champion and in the hall of fame. She puts all the tickets she got on her and put them all on Mimiko. She then asks everyone in the room if they want to got PriPara. While they are traveling through the tunnel Mirei tells Yui and Laala that they can stream PriPara on the internet. Some of the girls went into PriPara and are amazed and Mirei gets her Idol Watch Maxed out. The girls, including Yui, wants Mirei to perform. Mirei tells Laala that she wants to perform together and they did a performance together while Yui asks Meganee to stream the performance. The girls staying at Avocado Academy watch the performance and want to go to PriPara. After Laala and Mirei's performance, Laala and Mirei get Super Cyalume Coords. Another PriPara building pops up and Mirei tells Laala if she has trouble call her. Mirei's Idol Watch rings and tells her to go to Iparaki and Yui and Mirei trade Friend Ticket

5.SummaryEnglish: Laala asks Punicorn if she knows how to be manager and able to reserve a venue. When Punicorns hears that she goes to sleep and Laala says that is not what a manager does. When Kuma arrives in Paparajuku to deliver shoes, he meets Laala and Yui and decides to train Punicorn. After Punicorn's training, she is able to reserve a venue which cause Laala and Yui's Idol Watches to max out and they do separate performances. During the performances, Head Disciplinarian Mimiko tries to block all the girls from watching the performances in PriPara and wonders how the two got in. After Yui performance, Punicorn hears something in the clock tower so she goes into the clock tower with Laala and Yui chasing after her. Punicorn meets a mysterious girl in the clock tower playing on a harp. When the clock gets to different time, the mysterious girl goes back to sleep. While Punicorn is in the clock tower, Yui and Laala try to open up the door but it is locked and they are amazed of the song. Kuma gets a message from his boss and Meganee asks him to deliver shoes to Parajuku. While he is on the way Punicorn thanks hims. Laala wonders why Kuma is in a Shoebill Uniform, Meganee tells her that Kuma made a mess in Parajuku and had his Manager license revoked which surprise Laala and Yui.

6.TitleEnglish: Dream Dream!? Infiltrating to the BoyPara!
6.SummaryEnglish: Laala begins a performance to attract girls to become idols. However, she is not successful and the girls leave PriPara to go to BoyPara. Laala decides to infiltrate into BoyPara. Principle Babaria knows that girls are going to BoyPara and wants to go herself. Then Head Disciplinarian Mimiko comes into the Principals office. Principal Babaria asks her to find out the entrance of all the girls that sneak into BoyPara. Laala and Yui joins the Sheep Squad. They do some sheep training and Yui smells some rice ball. She follows the scent and comes across her brother Shougo who rejects the rice ball to her. While she is doing that Laala decides to go into the tunnel but Head Disciplinarian Mimiko arrives at the entrance. Yui comes back needing a earmuff that she puts on Mimiko. The Sheep Squad, Laala and Yui goes into the tunnel while Mimiko is distracted. The Sheep Squad and Laala thank Yui for saving them. At BoyPara, Yui jumps and rolls on top of the males to get close to WITH. One of the male punches Yui into the air and she grabs the curtain on the ceiling. Shougo catches her and then kicks her out of the stage which Meganii is glad she is safe. After WITH's concert, Laala joins Yui in the room and she is surprised that Meganii is here in which he explains that he has two jobs, one in BoyPara and one in PriPara. Meganii delivers some advice to Yui and Laala in which Yui's Idol Watch maxes out. She does a performance and even the boy idols, WITH, in BoyPara are watching her. She is able to psyche and energize the crowd that all girls in the audience believe that PriPara is better than BoyPara. With WITH watching her show, Shougo gets annoyed that Yui interrupted his show and drew some of spotlight while the other members of WITH do like her show. Yui sends a present to Shougo which was embarrassing photos of him.

7.SummaryEnglish: Yui thinks of a plan to bring a Divine Idol for a TV special, Sophie calls Laala and Sophie agrees to help them. The TV live is starting but Sophie is missing. Yui tries to find Sophie while Laala continue hosting the TV live. Yui found Sophie, who lost her stamina and Head Disciplinarian Mimiko stops them. Mimiko doesn't think Sophie is a Divine Idol because she has lost stamina was not cool looking. After Mimiko leaves, Nino arrives ask if Yui and Sophie needs help and she carries them both for her workout. Yui stops to eat rice and Yui gave a rice ball to Sophie that had a Red Flash. Sophie eats the Red Flash and she is able to get some more girls into PriPara from her cool look. Sophie enters PriPara and her Idol Watch maxes out for bringing some girls and she meets Laala who was waiting for her. Sophie gives a stunning performance that boosts ratings and she gets a Super Cyalume Coord while Nino is watching the show and she knows that Sophie is the girl she carried.

8.SummaryEnglish: Yui and Laala want to invite Sophie and Mirei to the Divine Idol Contest in Paparajuku but Meganee tells them both that only new idols that performed here can participate. She also says that they can do the opening stage performance so Yui and Laala decide to scout idols. They try to scout Nino who does a lot of sports. They follow her to her sport activities and say that Nino must come to PriPara if they win. Laala and Yui fail in the activities except tennis. Yui and Laala get their Idol Watches max out for trying and they perform together. After performing together, Nino says that there is a connection between idols and sports. Yui and Laala meet Laala friends from Parajuku after they exit the stage.

9.TitleEnglish: Grand Opening of the Fashion Studio
9.SummaryEnglish: Yui and Laala make flyers to convince girls to become idols. When the Head Disciplinarian Mimiko arrives, Yui and Laala escape. They are startled by Chiako who sneaks up on them and she does their hair. They drag Chiako to PriPara and she opens up a fashion store with simple stuff. Then it upgrades into a shack which causes a lot people to come to PriPara. The Sheep Squad arrives and argues with Yui and Laala that Chiako should stop going to PriPara for her friends and stick with BoyPara. In the end, Chiako decides not to go with both her friends, BoyPara and PriPara. After Chiako stop going to PriPara, the Fashion Studio was closed and that causes the decline of girls coming to PriPara. Laala disguises herself as WITH members to convince the Sheep Squad to let Chiako continue her dream. Yui is able to convince the Sheep Squad to come to PriPara to see how good Chiako is with her fashion studio. Now see her doing well in the fashion studio they decide to support her. Yui and Laala max out their Idol Watches and do a Duet performance. After the performance, the fashion studio changes to a PriPara Fashion Studio with Sheep Squad saying that Chiako will accept to become a Stylist in PriPara Fashion Studio and she can still go to BoyPara.

10.TitleEnglish: Yo, I Became a Helper Idol!
10.SummaryEnglish: Laala and Yui still try to convince Nino to perform in PriPara. Laala and Yui try to do a showroom in Paparajuku Sports Competition selling rice balls, which didn't do anything. Nino wins every competition except That's How It Goes. In That's How It Goes, she meets Shion who proves to be better than Nino and Nino lost the game. Shion tells her that she is an idol trying to hone her skill. In paintball, Laala and Yui team up to get Nino but they were taken out by Nino. Then Head Disciplinarian Mimiko arrives to make Laala and Yui retire from being an idol. Yui begin to daydream and Laala wakes her up from her daydream. Nino throws Paintball smoke grenades and they try to escape from Mimiko. Yui protects Nino from Mimiko's Paintball gun and Laala gives a big Paintball gun to Nino and she wins the Paintball game. She then decides to go with Yui and Laala to PriPara and her Idol Watch maxes out for helping Laala and Yui. She does performance and Shion watches her on her phone smiling. Laala and Yui tell her about the idol Grand Prix which is on a Sunday and Nino tells them that she has softball game that day which shocks Laala and Yui.
